headline: Another open source identity and access management solution?
description:
When we worked for our last employer, a B2B software company, we realized that most identity and access management solutions are developed only for B2C use cases while simple delegated access management and self-service still post high development costs in multi-tenancy use cases. That's why we founded ZITADEL. With the idea of developing an open source product that is also available as a SaaS solution, we want to make integration as easy as possible for developers.

We just released a new major version and would love your feedback. https://github.com/zitadel/zitadel/releases/tag/v2.0.0

Also we launched on Product Hunt today and would be great to get some support and feedback. https://www.producthunt.com/posts/zitadel
headline_zh-Hans: 另一个开源的身份和访问管理解决方案？
headline_zh-Hant: 另一個開源的身份和訪問管理解決方案？
description_zh-Hans:
当我们为我们的上一个雇主，一家B2B软件公司工作时，我们意识到大多数身份和访问管理解决方案只为B2C用例开发，而简单的委托访问管理和自助服务在多租户用例中仍然有很高的开发成本。这就是我们创立ZITADEL的原因。我们的想法是开发一个开源产品，也可以作为一个SaaS解决方案，我们希望让开发人员尽可能容易地进行整合。

我们刚刚发布了一个新的主要版本，希望得到您的反馈。https://github.com/zitadel/zitadel/releases/tag/v2.0.0

此外，我们今天在Product Hunt上推出，如果能得到一些支持和反馈，那就太好了。https://www.producthunt.com/posts/zitadel
